name: Superhero Bike Stunt Games 3D
summary: Superheros Downhill Moto Bike Xtreme and bike racing game available on Android is going to be the best bike driving and trial racing stunt game. The unparalleled physics engine gives you a level of control that you won’t believe what you’re playing in the palm of your hand! You are going to enjoy an amazing extreme off-road tricky bike race, drive & ride experience on impossible race tracks with superheroes as your stunt & racing driver. Challenging race tracks await you in this tricky bike game that will test your top stunt and racing stunts skills & how you perform difficult stunts like real stunts, crazy bike stunts, freestyle stunts, and tricky stunts on crazy impossible tracks.
